name: Healthy Practices for Healthy Musicians
description: This course introduces students to the field of musicians' health through a blend of physical practices and theorietical discussions. Each class includes a yoga-based movement practice and a discussinos of relevant concepts including basic anatomy for musicians, motor learning techniques, and strategies for adddressing performance anxiety and achieving peak performance. Students will leave the course with a repertoire of stretches and exercises to counterbalance strains assocaited with playing their instruments, strategies to make effective use of practice time, and an awareness of available health resources in the community and online.
